summary: A documentary following Terry Gilliam through the creation of "12 Monkeys" (1995)
cast: Keith Fulton|Terry Gilliam|Charles Roven|Lloyd Phillips|Jeffrey Beecroft|Crispian Sallis|Ernie Malik|Janet Peoples|David Webb Peoples|Mark Egerton|Mick Audsley|Dorothea Braemer|Nanette Wizov|Kristi Connors|Ken Haas|John Haralambous|Daniel Hardt|Bob Hering|Meg Knowles|Michael Kuetemeyer|Karin Morris|Birgitte Mortensen|Michael O'Reilly|Christopher Sapienza|Anula Shetty|Brad Thoennes|Paul Buckmaster|Aaron Michael Lacey|Joseph Melito|Brad Pitt|Christopher Plummer|Madeleine Stowe|Bruce Willis

title: The Hamster Factor and Other Tales of Twelve Monkeys
